resources.string:
Since this is the first time you are using GeoStripper, I thought I should share what Geostripper does. You will only see this annoying info once. I promise...

GeoStripper is a man-in-the-middle tool that safeguards your geo-location privacy when you share your photos online. Next time you decide to share your picture via sms, email, your favorite social network or your favorite photo sharing tool, select GeoStripper instead of your favorite Gallery.

GeoStripper intelligently determines a default gallery application and you will be able to change that default at the next screen. Once the default gallery is selected,
